enumerations.name: DiagnosticEventWindowTimeEnum
enumerations.note: This represents the ability to define the semantics of the event window. Aggregated by DiagnosticEventWindow.eventWindowTime

literals.name: infiniteTimeTo
literals.description:
This value specifies that the event window shall stay active for an infinite amount of time (e.g. open Response window until power off).
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=3

literals.name: powerWindowTime
literals.description:
This enumeration value specifies that the server shall send response on event messages until the server is powered down. The server stops sending response on event messages with the power down and will send no more response on event messages after server is up again.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=4

enumerations.name: DiagnosticResponseOnEventActionEnum
enumerations.note: This meta-class has the ability to define sub-functions of the UDS service ResponseOnEvent. Aggregated by DiagnosticResponseOnEvent.responseOnEventAction

literals.name: onChangeOfDataIdentifier
literals.description:
Reports based on change of data identifier.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=6

literals.name: onComparisonOfValues
literals.description:
Triggered if data condition is met (e.g. RPM over 5000 1/min).
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=8

literals.name: onDTCStatusChange
literals.description:
Reports based on change of DTC status.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=7

literals.name: reportDTCRecordInformationOnDtc
literals.description:
Reports the DTC record-related information based on a DTC status change. (Subfunction 0x09)
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=5

literals.name: reportMostRecentDtcOnStatus
literals.description:
Triggers the report of the most recent failed or confirmed DTC (Subfunction 0x08).
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=4

literals.name: start
literals.description:
Starts the response on event service.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=1

literals.name: stop
literals.description:
Stops the response on event service.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=0
